alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 01 at 6:24PM CST until December 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Forecast flooding increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier For the Calcasieu River...including Salt Water Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Vermilion River...including Lafayette Surrey Street Gage... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 630 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From Monday evening to early Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6 AM CST Friday the stage was 4.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.6 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
